A sermon preached at the funeral of Mr. Jos. Glanvil late rector of Bath, and chaplain in ordinary to His Majesty, who dyed at his rectory of Bath, the fourth of November, 1680, and was buried there the ninth of the same month / by Jos. Pleydell ... Pleydell, Josiah, d. 1707.
[2], 25 p.
Printed for Henry Mortlock ..., London : 1681.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
=======

[2], 25 p.
Printed for Henry Mortlock ..., London : 1681.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
Henry Mortlock
